overview: The filthiest Granny on the planet is back with her latest all-girl DVD, co-starring som eof the biggest names in pron. Sahara Knite (Game of Thrones), Rebecca Jane Smyth, Tanya Virago and Tindra Frost among others all come together in one huge vagina flavoured explosive chick-fest.  Once again, Lacey's served up a real treat for all the fans of girl on girl fan and the connoisseurs of full-on lesbian action.
title: Grandma's Dirty Little Secrets 2
